extendedInfo.description: ONLY IN ANDROID MARKET!Good News:Weapon Chicken - Fighting!New features:1. Add snowing festival level - Christmas Town.2. Add 4 cute monsters with totally new attacking skills.3. Add one Christmas Suit increasing agility.4. Adjust power of some bullets.5. Revise incorrect words.6. much more amazing.Previous player comments:Some of them are encouraging:* âWeapon chicken	One of the most fun games I have played. I love that chickenâ - Jorge* âNice game	Great looking game, plays well & it's free! Some paid games should really learn from companies like this.â - Thuie1313Some of them help us improve it:*"Grrr Wow what a horrible upgrade system. Don't even waste your time with this one guys." - chrisThanks for all of you guys, for the strong support you give us - EasyFunGame Team. We will keep releasing new fun games.Like our game? Don't forget to rate our game to get free golds equipping your chicken.Follow us to get the first hand news about EasyFunGame's new and free games and come up with your ideas.:facebook page:http://www.facebook.com/pages/EasyFunGame/136613793102793twitter:https://twitter.com/#!/EasyFunGameIn the game, you play as a heavily armed chicken. The only task is advancing with courage through three wonderful worlds where variety kinds of monster will appear. The deeper you advance, the more dangerous monsters will be. Are you afraid now?Don't worry. Meanwhile the chicken could refuel the supplies and even more improve the power of bullets.The Game is 3D and well designed. However, it's totally free fully with our hope that you guys enjoying playing it.  This high quality game only exists in Android Market. Come and join the game and enjoy fun.Game Features:	Control:		1. Slide the left stick to move around,		2. Slide the right stick to shoot monsters.	Attention:		Always pay attention to all kinds of supplies including:		1)  All kinds of bullet packages 		2)  Medical kits		3)  Transform into tank firing horrible bullet. 	Goal:		1) Try your best to fight through all the levels in three amazing worlds                 2) Collect as much gold as you can		3) Improve your global rating.	Rewarding:		With the gold acquired in the game, arm your chick to be a stronger solider in the Weapon Shop. See the wonderful battle skills in the video below.

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: The update just ruined it, now items are at least 10 times the price and you get basically nothing.  Play alien shooter for an example of a great twin stick shooter.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun, but repetitive
reviews.comment: This game is certainly fun at first, but do not expect gameplay to feel much different from level to level\342\200\224it still feels repetitive despite the different types of enemies and weapons.
reviews.author: A Google User
